game.name: Trope Tales
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A somewhat comical take on classic JRPGs. Take on the role of Hero, a Silent Protagonist, as you venture across the world to defeat the Main Villains with the help of your friends: The Chick, The Smart Guy, and The Childhood Friend.
